definition: to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to hand in/to hand over/to seize

sentences.english: In 1991, the rescue excavation took place after the tomb was robbed twice.
sentences.chinese: 1991年进行了抢救性发掘，并追缴回大量文物。

sentences.english: If it fails to pay the taxes, the tax organ shall demand payment of arrears .
sentences.chinese: 未依法纳税的，税务机关应当予以追缴。

sentences.english: Offenders who confess to escaping being demanded tax arrears will get off.
sentences.chinese: 逃避追缴欠税款主动悔罪被从轻。
